reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel from 3rd - 10th January as a last minute escape to the sun. Having been to Egypt before (Taba and El Gouna) we know what to expect. We never do all inclusive holidays but keeping in mind that this was a last minute escape for £329 pp we thought we could not go wrong.
reviews.title: good value for money but defenitely not 5 star
